definitions.definition: Pertaining to or having the nature of fire; containing fire; resembling fire.
examples: The stone had an igneous appearance.

definitions.definition: Resulting from, or produced by, great heat. With rocks, it could also mean formed from lava or magma .
examples: Granite and basalt are igneous rocks.

main_definition: Pertaining to or having the nature of fire; containing fire; resembling fire.
secondary_definitions: ( geology ) Resulting from, or produced by, great heat. With rocks, it could also mean formed from lava or magma .
